message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,000. I believe this is a fair price given its value to you.  What do you think?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my budget, I am able to offer $13,000 for the product. I hope this aligns with your expectations.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $13,000 is still a bit low for me. I'm willing to come down to $13,500. This would give us both a fair deal. What do you think?
Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I understand your position, but based on my budget constraints, I can't go above $13,000. I hope we can find a mutually agreeable solution.
